Keys.name: Chapter Title Message
Keys.description: Chapter Title that appears on-screen when this level starts.

Keys.name: Start Fade Pixels
Keys.description: Number of pixels wide to start fading props (<0 = use fademaxdist). Ignored if the prop has a fade distance set.

Keys.name: End Fade Pixels
Keys.description: Number of pixels wide to unfade props (0 = never fade). Ignored if the prop has a fade distance set.
